title: Gal Knight Angelica
description: Haru (13), who became an adventurer in search of his brother who is a hero, came to the Adventurer's Guild to find party members. There, he was introduced to Angelica, a female knight with brown skin and golden hair. These are colored members who gather for some reason, including gal knights. The quest that I undertook with the people who did not move forward at all was - to exterminate the Gal Witch! A different world fantasy presented by members who are too funny!
